content: If Emma's mom doesn't think the waste bin is a secure disposal, then she may have chosen to flush Emma's diaper down the toilet to protect her privacy. It's possible that Emma's mom believed that flushing the diaper would prevent anyone from seeing or handling it, thus protecting Emma's privacy. It's also possible that Emma's mom thought that flushing the diaper was the most convenient and hygienic option. Ultimately, it's up to the parent to decide what they believe is the best way to dispose of their child's waste in order to protect their privacy and maintain hygiene.
